response.original_title: Heroes: The greatest war movies ever
response.overview: For the first time ever, the film industry has thrown its archives open to create the definitive collection of the greatest war movies ever made! HEROES showcases the best scenes from the greatest war movies as chosen by you, the British public. And while you take in the epic land battles, explosive naval engagements, mind-blowing aerial duels and Oscar winning drama, know that for every Â£9.99 you spend all profits will go directly to helping our wounded Servicemen and women. Featuring scenes from: SAVING PRIVATE RYAN, SCHINDLER'S LIST, THE HURT LOCKER, PLATOON and many more!
response.title: Heroes: The greatest war movies ever
